name: Half Day Inner Island Turtle Tour
description: The Half Day Inner Island Turtle Tour offers an exciting adventure for both experienced paddlers and beginners, with a focus on fun and enjoyment. Paddle through the turquoise waters of Shute Harbour, exploring fringing coral reefs and nearby tropical islands. Discover an amazing diversity of marine and bird-life, including sea turtles and soaring eagles. Ideal for those who enjoy nature and adventure, this tour provides a chance to swim, explore, or simply relax on unique beaches. Perfect for families and individuals seeking a memorable kayaking experience.
includes:
Cold drinks
Muesli bars
Fruit platter
Guided kayaking tour
highlights:
Kayak over fringing coral reefs
Explore nearby tropical islands
Spot sea turtles and soaring eagles
Chance to encounter humpback whales (July to September)
Opportunity to swim and explore unique beaches
age_requirements: Children welcome - age 7 upwards (1 adult per child)
ideal_for: Beginners to experienced paddlers, families, and nature enthusiasts seeking an engaging and enjoyable kayaking experience

name: Full Day Tropical Island Kayak and Snorkel Adventure
description: Experience the Whitsunday Islands like never before with the Full Day Tropical Island Kayak and Snorkel Adventure. This tour is perfect for nature enthusiasts and adventure seekers looking to explore crystal-clear waters and vibrant marine life. Paddle through the serene inner islands, relax and swim at White Rock, and cross to South Molle Island where you may spot turtles, dolphins, and even humpback whales during their migration season. The tour offers a unique opportunity to trek the scenic Mount Jeffries Walking Track, providing breathtaking panoramic views across the islands. Enjoy a delicious beach-based buffet lunch, making this an unforgettable day in paradise.
includes:
Experienced guide
Small group of paddlers
Kayaking equipment
Safety briefing
Beach-based buffet lunch
Reef tax
GST
highlights:
Kayak through the inner islands and to White Rock
Relax and swim at White Rock
Cross to South Molle Island
Spot marine life such as turtles, dolphins, and sea eagles
Opportunity to snorkel fringing coral reef if conditions are favorable
Trek Mount Jeffries Walking Track for panoramic views
See humpback whales during migration season (July-September)
price_tiers: Standard: A$220 (includes lunch, reef tax and GST)
ideal_for: Nature enthusiasts, adventure seekers, and kayakers of all skill levels

name: 6 Day Guided Whitsunday Kayak Tour
description: Embark on the ultimate Whitsunday adventure with this 6-day guided kayaking expedition. Perfect for outdoor enthusiasts and nature lovers, this tour offers an immersive experience in the stunning Whitsunday Islands. Paddle through turquoise waters, explore vibrant coral reefs, and camp under the stars on secluded beaches. Whether you're a seasoned kayaker or a curious beginner, this expedition promises breathtaking views, unique wildlife encounters, and unforgettable memories.
includes:
5 full days of sea kayaking
Snorkeling equipment
Camping gear
Experienced guides
Transfers from Airlie Beach to Shute Harbour
Fast water taxi to Whitehaven Beach
All meals during the expedition
highlights:
Explore the Whitsunday wilderness
Snorkel vibrant coral reefs
Camp under the stars
Visit Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet
Bushwalk to Chance Bay Lookout
Paddle along the east coast to Cairn Camp Site
Experience breathtaking views from Cairn Lookout
Discover the marine life at Maureen’s Cove
Final paddle to Bali Hai
itinerary:
**Day 1:** Arrive at Airlie Beach, meet guides, and transfer to Shute Harbour. Fast water taxi to Whitehaven Beach, explore Haselwood Island, and bushwalk to Chance Bay Lookout.
**Day 2:** Paddle north along the coastline, swim at Hill Inlet, and continue to Cairn Camp Site.
**Day 3:** Early morning walk to Cairn Lookout, paddle to Crayfish Beach on Hook Island.
**Day 4:** Kayak around Hook Island to Maureen’s Cove, snorkel in the area.
**Day 5:** Final paddle to Bali Hai, explore coral gardens.
**Day 6:** Return to Airlie Beach.
ideal_for: Outdoor enthusiasts, nature lovers, adventure seekers, and families looking for a unique island experience.

This tour is ideal for those seeking a fun and engaging outdoor activity, with a chance to relax on secluded beaches and enjoy refreshing snacks provided by our knowledgeable guides.

Explore tropical islands

Relax on unique beaches or islands
Guides share local knowledge

name: Full Day Tropical Island Kayak and Snorkel Adventure
description: Embark on an exhilarating sea kayaking adventure through the Whitsunday Islands, perfect for beginners and experienced paddlers alike. Experience the thrill of paddling through crystal-clear waters, exploring secluded islands, and encountering diverse marine life including turtles, dolphins, and vibrant tropical fish. Ideal for nature enthusiasts and adventure seekers, this full-day tour offers a unique opportunity to connect with the stunning natural beauty of the Whitsundays, complete with a beach-based buffet lunch.
includes:
Experienced guide
Kayaking equipment
Safety briefing
Beach-based buffet lunch
Reef tax
GST
highlights:
Sea kayaking through the Whitsunday Islands
Relaxing and swimming at White Rock
Crossing to South Molle Island
Wildlife sightings including turtles, dolphins, and sea eagles

name: 6 Day Guided Whitsunday Kayak Tour
description: Embark on the ultimate overnight sea kayaking expedition through the pristine Whitsunday Islands. This 6-day adventure is perfect for those seeking an immersive experience in nature, with opportunities for snorkeling, bushwalking, and camping under the stars. Paddle through sparkling turquoise waters, explore the iconic Whitehaven Beach, and marvel at the breathtaking views from Hill Inlet. Ideal for adventure seekers and nature lovers, this tour promises unforgettable memories in one of the world's most beautiful marine environments.
includes:
Expert sea kayak guides
5 full days of sea kayaking
Snorkeling and bushwalking
Camping equipment
Transfers from Airlie Beach to Shute Harbour
Fast water taxi to Whitehaven Beach
highlights:
Explore the Whitsunday wilderness
Snorkel in fringing coral reefs
Marvel at views from Hill Inlet
Camp under the stars on pristine beaches
Paddle through crystal-clear waters
Visit iconic Whitehaven Beach
Experience diverse marine life
Enjoy a short bushwalk to Chance Bay Lookout
itinerary:
**Day 1:**
Arrive and settle in at the group hotel in Airlie Beach. Meet your guides for a briefing and equipment handout. Transfer to Shute Harbour and take a fast water taxi to Whitehaven Beach. Set up camp and explore Haselwood Island with snorkeling opportunities.
**Day 2:**
Paddle north along the coastline to Hill Inlet for a swim and lookout visit. Continue to Cairn Camp Site.
**Day 3:**
Morning walk to Cairn Lookout for stunning views. Paddle to Crayfish Beach on Hook Island for snorkeling and camping.
**Day 4:**
Kayak around Hook Island's north-eastern tip to Maureen’s Cove, a renowned snorkeling site.
**Day 5:**
Paddle west towards Bali Hai, a picturesque island with vibrant coral gardens.
**Day 6:**
Conclude the expedition and return to Airlie Beach.
ideal_for: Adventure seekers, nature lovers, and those looking for an immersive outdoor experience.

Enjoy a beach-based buffet lunch and the opportunity to snorkel the fringing coral reef, making it an unforgettable day in paradise.

Opportunity to snorkel the fringing coral reef

name: 6 Day Guided Whitsunday Kayak Tour
description: Embark on the ultimate 6-day sea kayaking expedition through the breathtaking Whitsunday Islands. This adventure is perfect for those seeking an immersive experience in nature, combining the thrill of kayaking with the tranquility of camping under the stars. Explore the turquoise waters and white silica sands of Whitehaven Beach, snorkel in vibrant coral gardens, and marvel at iconic views from Hill Inlet. Ideal for adventure seekers and nature lovers, this tour offers a unique opportunity to connect with the stunning marine and terrestrial environments of the Whitsundays.
includes:
5 full days of sea kayaking
Snorkelling
Bush walking
Camping equipment
Guided tours with expert sea kayak guides
Transfers from Airlie Beach to Shute Harbour
highlights:
Explore the Whitsunday wilderness
Snorkel vibrant fringing coral reefs
Camp under the stars on pristine beaches
Visit the iconic Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet
Enjoy stunning views from various lookout points
Experience the thrill of kayaking in turquoise waters
Witness diverse marine life including turtles and stingrays
itinerary:
**Day 1:**
Arrive and settle in at the group hotel. Meet your guides and receive a briefing. Transfer to Shute Harbour and then to Whitehaven Beach by water taxi. Set up camp and explore Haselwood Island with snorkeling and a bushwalk to Chance Bay Lookout.
**Day 2:**
Paddle north following the coastline to Hill Inlet for a swim and lookout visit. Continue to Cairn Camp Site.
**Day 3:**
Early morning walk to Cairn Lookout, then paddle to Crayfish Beach on Hook Island. Enjoy world-class coral and marine life.
**Day 4:**
Kayak around Hook Island to Maureen’s Cove for snorkeling and camping.
**Day 5:**
Head west to Bali Hai, explore coral gardens, and spot diverse marine life.
**Day 6:**
Return journey and conclusion of the tour.
ideal_for: Adventure seekers, nature lovers, and those looking to explore the Whitsunday Islands in an active and immersive way.
